title: DungeonLoot: Open Beta Has Arrived!
description: The GamerPower team is on a quest to bring more loot to gamers, so we created DungeonLoot. The idea is something like Amazon Prime Gaming, but completely free. No subscriptions or costs, just a place where you can claim gaming loot anytime. Our goal? To make DungeonLoot the ultimate place for gaming giveaways.
instructions: 1. Click the button to visit DungeonLoot. 2. Simply create an account. 3. Select your favorite giveaway and grab the loot. It's that easy!
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Minecraft: Peace Builders (DLC)
description: Claim your Minecraft: Peace Builders (DLC) for free and join an adventure to build and protect peace around the globe.
instructions:
1. Open up the Marketplace on your favorite device and download the pack.
2. Have fun!
platforms: PC, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Minecraft: Seaside Story (DLC)
description: Claim your free Minecraft: Seaside Story (DLC) and go fishing, customize your boat, upgrade the island and discover amazing creatures in brand new ocean biomes!
instructions:
1. Open up the Minecraft Marketplace on your device and download the skin pack before the offer expires.
2. That's it! Have fun!
platforms: PC, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Minecraft: Vibrant Adventurers Volume 1, 2 and 3
description: Grab the The Vibrant Adventurers Volume 1, 2 and 3 for Minecraft. All links below.
platforms: PC, Playstation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox 360, Android, iOS
